titles.title: Honoring Apostle Frederick K.C. Price on his 80th birthday.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 1/18/2012--Introduced. Honors Apostle Frederick K.C. Price, who is known for the Crenshaw Christian Center and the Ever Increasing Faith Ministries, on his 80th birthday and for his philanthropy, service, and social justice efforts worldwide.
